titulo: Drawings in pen & pencil from Dürer's day to ours, with notes and appreciations

The book explores the significance and evolution of pen and pencil drawings through the ages, highlighting works from renowned artists including Albrecht Dürer, Leonardo da Vinci, and Michelangelo.
